content:
Hey everyone, I'm trying to setup a node on ropsten to test some mining (so I can't use any of the other testnets), but I seem to be on the wrong chain so I can't really confirm any of my tests
My node's height : `11'219'041`
Etherscan's ropsten height : `11'226'546`
Does anyone have any node I could connect to in order to be on the correct chain ? 
Also, here's how I start my node
```bash
docker run \
    ...
    -d ethereum/client-go:v1.10.9 \
    --ropsten \
    --syncmode=full \
    --port $P2P_PORT \
    --nousb \
    --allow-insecure-unlock \
    --http \
    --http.addr 0.0.0.0 \
    --http.port $RPC_PORT \
    --maxpeers 256 \
    --cache 2048 \
    --mine \
    --miner.threads 0 \
    --miner.etherbase 0x0c91BD44EA7877Af95eE905342B9B88F4FFF961c \
    --miner.recommit "5s" \
    --miner.extradata "ropsten" \
```
